comment.body:
Just used it, great post!
You may want to correct an issue I had on Windows 10 64bit:
the command "Python\python.exe ZeroNet\zeronet.py siteSign yourAddress" does not execute correctly if launched from above the ZeroNet folder... it works if you remain inside it and launch "..\Python\python.exe zeronet.py siteSign yourAddress".

Oh, and change in backslashes the Windows command slashes please, it's faster to cp-pst-exc that way.
